issue.title: Remove header from image.proto. Remove time from image_stamped.proto

content.raw:
The situation is similar for other `*_stamped` messages:

~~~
├── images_stamped.proto
├── image_stamped.proto
├── joint_wrench_stamped.proto
├── laserscan_stamped.proto
├── poses_stamped.proto
├── pose_stamped.proto
├── sonar_stamped.proto
└── wrench_stamped.proto
~~~

Now that all messages have an optional header, maybe it makes sense to get rid of all stamped messages?
